channel.title: Talks on Paul Simmering's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Paul Simmering's blog

item.title: AI for Social Media Monitoring at dm
item.description: A presentation on Cosmention’s data pipeline and how Cosmention is used at dm, the largest drugstore chain in Europe. The presentation starts with a review of language models and word vectors and then dives into text classification and named entity recognition. Photo by Christopher Burns on Unsplash

item.title: StakeX - Organizational Networks from Web Research
item.description: Thomas Perry and me presented the StakeX method, which was developed at Q Insight Agency. Photo by Alina Grubnyak on Unsplash

item.title: R Shiny for Interactive Data Visualization – A Case Study
Human and AI Decision Making in a Game of Innovation and Imitation.
item.description: A presentation of the research project I conducted at Aalborg University for my master thesis. I investigated the use of artificial intelligence (AI) in managerial decision making by example of a business game. Six human participants competed against an AI agent. The agent combines Monte Carlo Tree Search with prediction of outcomes using an artificial neural network. While playing, human participants gave a think-aloud protocol. Among other results, the study found architectural parallels in thought processes, qualitative differences in decisions due to AI’s lack of reciprocity, and potential problems in value alignment.
